statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT address, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id >= 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address NOT LIKE '%Lane%';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT address, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) as total_orders FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 1;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE status IN ('Processing', 'Shipped') ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 3;
SELECT name, email, total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products;
SELECT transaction_id, quantity, total_price FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, o.order_date, t.total_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN transactions t ON o.order_id = t.order_id WHERE c.first_name LIKE 'J%' AND t.quantity > 1 ORDER BY c.last_name ASC, o.order_date DESC;

SELECT o.order_id, c.first_name AS customer_first_name, p.product_name, t.quantity, t.total_price FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN transactions t ON o.order_id = t.order_id JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id WHERE t.quantity >= 3 ORDER BY o.order_id DESC, c.first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 'c4e05429-487f-4b6b-90db-72e3e1b4d9dd';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT team_name, manager_id FROM sales_teams WHERE team_name LIKE '%Sales%';
SELECT report_id, total_sales FROM sales_reports WHERE total_sales > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC, email DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT team_name, manager_id FROM sales_teams WHERE team_name ILIKE 'sales%'

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount, sales_reports.report_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN sales_reports ON sales_reports.team_id = (SELECT team_id FROM sales_teams LIMIT 1)
